name: iOS Stickers Pack
body:
> require iOS 10 or later

### Adding new target
By clicking on **Xcode** tab _Editor -> Add Target -> iOS -> Sticker Pack App_

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/92309b48-b523-11e8-8d8e-cc2da48b7198)

### Version Number
> General section

Check that **Version** and **Build** number equal versions of  project **Unity-iPhone**

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/e2b23bd8-b525-11e8-9d19-e4c3a6a328bf)

### Paste stickers pack icons
> General section

Setup **Sticker Icons Source** as show below

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/d4d72fc0-b528-11e8-81c8-026c1972971c)

Paste images to **MessageAppIcon** and **StickerPack** from [archive](https://git.playflock.com/MobileDev/iOSStickersPack/files/4/Stickers.zip)

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/90f433be-b52a-11e8-9ac3-24e44089987c)

### Unity Reassembly
To avoid repeat all steps try build Unity iOS project in **Append Mode**

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/0d7e8a5e-b52d-11e8-8679-6a6fca1c2ff2)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
